name: Escape The Rooms:Room Escape Challenge Games
name_original: Escape The Rooms:Room Escape Challenge Games
description:
Can you escape?
One day, You lost in a mystic NO MANS Town, You have to find a way out.
Open all the doors and Escape from the town!
Tap the objects and find the hidden items to figure out the puzzles using your brain.

. No time trials
. Auto-saving
. 6 different scene
. No wifi needed
